```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Import data

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv(
  file = "./data/FAS_litters.csv",
  na = c(".", "NA", ""))
litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

pups_df = read_csv(
  file ="./data/FAS_litters.csv",
  skip  = 3,
  na = c(".", "NA", ""))
pups_df =
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)

skimr::skim(litters_df)
```
